RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the motion to suppress: Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.ten undocumented aliens: hidden in the tractor-trailer's sleeper area, discovered during search by United States Border Patrol Agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz: defendant and transporter of aliens, charged with conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Miguel Hernandez-Gomez: alien being transported, discovered hidden in the tractor-trailer's sleeper area
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's indictment: indictment against Ramon De La Cruz for alien transportation offenses, including conspiracy to transport aliens within the United States for commercial advantage or private financial gain
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress: motion filed by Ramon De La Cruz to suppress evidence seized from the immigration checkpoint stop, challenging both the duration of the stop and the ensuing search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.suppression hearing: hearing where evidence was presented regarding the immigration checkpoint stop and the search of the tractor-trailer
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court that denied Ramon De La Cruz's motion to suppress and his motion to dismiss the indictment on Speedy Trial Act grounds
